channel.title: Comments for page "Tiny Bee A-Salt Rifle"

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: The link to the 'own festival' terry marksman is broken. Looks like you're trying to link to a page specifically for the own festival version. That information was just added on to the regular marksman page. Could someone please fix?
